questions.question: If you could have any magical weapon, which would you choose?
How do you react in a crisis?

answers.text: Protect my friends at all costs

Rion.description: You’re the leader — brave, dependable, and a little stubborn. You always shine brightest under pressure.

Jax.description: You’re the heart of the group, full of charm, energy, and wild ideas. You keep everyone laughing.

Kai.description: You’re calm, protective, and quietly powerful. You never let your guard down when it matters.

Luna.description: You’re creative, mysterious, and always two steps ahead. Your mind is your greatest weapon.
